articles.title: Ukraine aims for repeat victory in most political Eurovision in years - The Guardian
articles.description: Four-hour broadcast will feature taunts at Putin and a singalong of a Liverpool anthem
articles.content:
There will be rockets, soldiers and moustachioed men in their underpants lampooning Vladimir Putin as a crocodile psychopath and thats just the Croatian act.

articles.title: Blake Shelton supported by Gwen Stefani and stepsons as he receives star on Hollywood Walk of Fame - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 46-year-old country crooner - who is currently starring in his final season of The Voice -  was joined by the 53-year-old No Doubt frontwoman and her three sons at the ceremony in Hollywood.
articles.content:
Blake Shelton looked every bit the family man as he was supported by wife Gwen Stefani and his stepsons while receiving his star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
